column4: ive got server 9.04 ... everytime i change my /etc/motd file it works, untill i rebot then it gets over written could i have some help please
see the motd.tail manpage to see what the server does to create the manpage.
if it is missing and newer Xorg versions dont need it, how can you make changes that will stick with a reboot ?
If its there, then xorg will honor it.
